title: Bomber jacket costume

properties.name: description
properties.value: The bomber jacket costume consists of a bomber jacket and bomber cap which are rewards from the Enlightened Journey quest. It can be stored in the Armour case of the costume room in a player-owned house. If lost, the cap and jacket can be obtained for free from Auguste.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Bomber jacket costume

The bomber jacket costume consists of a bomber jacket and bomber cap which are rewards from the Enlightened Journey quest. It can be stored in the Armour case of the costume room in a player-owned house. If lost, the cap and jacket can be obtained for free from Auguste.

Gnome goggles from the Gnome Restaurant activity can be combined with the Bomber cap by talking with Auguste. Players can separate them by choosing the "Split" option when right-clicking the cap and goggles. The costume is often worn with a gnome scarf.

The costume, not including the cap and goggles, is considered warm clothing when facing the Wintertodt.

Components[edit | edit source]

Note that when storing the bomber jacket costume in an Armour case, either the bomber cap or the cap and goggles may be used.

• Bomber cap
• Cap and goggles
• Bomber jacket
